# iru_device_notes (Data Source)

List all notes for a specific device.

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "iru_device_notes" "example" {
  device_id = "your-device-uuid"
}

output "device_notes" {
  value = data.iru_device_notes.example.notes
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `device_id` (String) The unique identifier for the Device.

### Read-Only

- `notes` (Attributes List) (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--notes))

<a id="nestedatt--notes"></a>
### Nested Schema for `notes`

Read-Only:

- `author` (String)
- `content` (String)
- `created_at` (String)
- `id` (String)
- `updated_at` (String)
